scripts.dev:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only -r dotenv/config src/server.ts
scripts.start:stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.stg ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only -r dotenv/config src/server.ts
scripts.seed:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local ts-node -r dotenv/config src/seeders/index.ts dotenv_config_path=.env.local
scripts.seed:stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.stg ts-node -r dotenv/config src/seeders/index.ts
scripts.db:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local ts-node -r dotenv/config src/scripts/reset-database.ts
scripts.db:reset:stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.stg ts-node -r dotenv/config src/scripts/reset-database.ts
